Package frc.robot.util.hyperdrive.util

Class HyperdriveUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • frc.robot.util.hyperdrive.util.HyperdriveUtil
  • public class HyperdriveUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is similar to Utilities in Monopoly, because similarly to the fact that the Utilities are the worst property in Monopoly, this class is the worst in this library.

                                     Units.LENGTH desired)

        Parameters:
        value - The value of the measurement to convert.
        original - The current unit of the measurement.
        desired - The unit to convert the measurement to.
        Returns:
        The value of the measurement in the desired unit.

        Parameters:

        desired - The units to convert the value to.

                                       double heading)
        Gets the angle that the robot needs to turn through to achieve a heading.

        heading - The desired heading to be achieved.

      • assertEquals

        public static boolean assertEquals​(java.lang.String assertionName,
                                   java.lang.Object item1,
                                   java.lang.Object item2)
        Tests the equality of two values, then prints and returns the result. Print string will be displayed on RioLog as an error reading: "Assertion [assertionName] SUCCEEDED/FAILED."
        Parameters:
        assertionName - The informational name of the assertion. Will be used in the printout.
        item1 - The first item to test.
        item2 - The second item to test.
        Returns:
        True if item1 equals item2. False otherwise.

      • getFilesInDirectory

                                                     boolean specifyDirectories)
        Returns a list of files.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to search
        specifyDirectories - If true, add a tag specifying whether or not a file is a directory.
        Returns:
        A list of files and directories.
